attributes.action: scrap the use of resurfacing roads with bitumen and stone chippings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allowing councils and the Highways agency to resurface roads with bitumen and stone chippings should be banned as it is a danger to all motorcyclists and car drivers.

This practice in no way improves the road surface and within a year the bitumen comes to the surface creating a slippery surface when wet/icy or cold.
